name: nauseously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you might vomit, or makes you feel that you might vomit: She was lying on the bed and mumbling nauseously. The medicine tasted nauseously bitter. The plant had an unpleasant odour and a nauseously strong flavour.
in a way that you dislike and disapprove of: I wish he'd stop being so nauseously nice to me. Some of the tributes to him were nauseously hypocritical.
More examplesFewer examplesEvery part of the plant is poisonous and nauseously bitter.The meat is not nauseously fatty.His supporters are nauseously flattering about him.
